headline: Boston Scientific’s Watchman could be new option for patients post ablation: study
summary: The trial compared the stroke prevention device for left atrial appendage closure to blood thinners in people who underwent cardiac ablation for AFib.

headline: The PFA race is heating up. Here’s where the market stands after J&J’s approval.
